question: A car travelling at a speed of 40 km/hour can complete a journey in 9 hours. How long will it take to travel the same distance at 60 km/hour?
explanation:
Total distance covered = speed $latex \\times$ Time
=40$latex \\times$9 = 360km/hr
The required time at 60 kmph = 360$latex \\div$60=6 hours.
Hence option [D] is the right answer.
